name: Sweet Thomas
description:
The game takes place in the world of "Sweet Land".
This world with an incredible atmosphere hides mysteries and adventures. On the surface there is almost no land, but there are incredible buildings with beautiful plants. It is truly the planet of the oceans. There are rumors that a thousand years ago a highly developed civilization flourished here.

Heroes of the game need to find answers traveling through the fascinating world and collect stars for the opportunity to go to the next level!

Features
  • Mysteries, secrets and adventures
  • The original bright world of the game
  • Various puzzles with switches and levers
  • Doors, keys and physics
